concept.title: Element features not applicable to SolidFire eSDS
concept.shortdesc: Some features of NetApp Element software are not applicable to SolidFire eSDS. Native Element features for traditional SolidFire storage nodes, such as hardware monitoring, firmware updates, Encryption as Rest (EAR) with Self-Encrypting Drives (SEDs), and Fibre Channel are disabled for SolidFire eSDS.

ul.li: Hardware monitoring, host platform updates (example: drivers, firmware, and operating system packages), and Fibre Channel
